form.longName: PhenX PX740401 - Selfreported Exposure To And Use Of Price Promotions Fo
form.preferredDefinition: This protocol includes 14 questions taken from a combination of the Wave 1 Adult and Youth Population Assessment of Tobacco and Health (PATH) Survey instruments. Collectively, the questions are used to measure consumer exposure to tobacco-product price promotions, including (but not limited to) lower price paid or free tobacco products, discounted prices when buying multiple tobacco product units, and free or discounted tobacco product with purchase of tobacco products.

module.longName: Self-reported Exposure to and Use of Price Promotions for Tobacco Products
module.preferredDefinition: Self-reported Exposure to and Use of Price Promotions for Tobacco Products

question.questionText: In the past 6 months, have you gotten a discount coupon for any tobacco product? ASK: All respondents (tobacco_pricepromotions_6months_coupongotten)
Where did you get discount coupons from? Choose all that apply. (tobacco_pricepromotions_coupons_from)

validValue.meaningText: Social Networks (such as Facebook and Twitter)
validValue.description: Social Networks (such as Facebook and Twitter)

validValue.meaningText: On a cigarette pack or other tobacco product
validValue.description: On a cigarette pack or other tobacco product

validValue.meaningText: From a friend or other person
validValue.description: From a friend or other person

question.questionText: SPECIFY Where did you get discount coupons from? (tobacco_pricepromotions_coupons_from_otherway)
In the past 6 months, have you received an email message with promotions or coupons for cigarettes or tobacco products? ASK: All respondents (tobacco_pricepromotions_6months_emailcoupons)
In the past 6 months, have you received promotions or coupons for cigarettes or tobacco products in the mail? ASK: All respondents (tobacco_pricepromotions_6months_mailcoupons)
In the past 6 months, have you used a discount coupon to purchase a tobacco product? (tobacco_pricepromotions_6months_couponused)

In the past 30 days, when you were in a store that sells tobacco, did you buy a brand of tobacco product other than your usual brand because you noticed a special price offer? ASK: Current tobacco users who have a regular brand (tobacco_pricepromotions_30days_buyspecialoffer)

In the past 30 days, have you bought a brand of tobacco product other than your usual brand because of a promotion? ASK: Current tobacco users who have a regular brand (tobacco_pricepromotions_30days_boughtalternatebrand_promotion)
In the past 30 days, has this happened just once or twice, a few times, or quite regularly? (tobacco_pricepromotions_30days_boughtalternatebrand_promotion_frequency)
In the past 30 days, have you ever bought a brand of tobacco product because you noticed a promotion for it? ASK: All respondents (tobacco_pricepromotions_30days_boughtbecauseof_promotion)
In the past 6 months, have you seen a tobacco sweepstakes ad? ASK: All respondents (sweeps_ad_740401)
In the past 6 months, have you participated in a tobacco sponsored sweepstakes? ASK: All respondents (tobacco_pricepromotions_6months_seentobacco_sweepstakesad)
In the past 30 days, have you bought a brand of tobacco product other than your usual brand because of a promotion? ASK: Current tobacco users who have a regular brand (qr_740401)
Have you ever used a smart phone to scan a QR code for a tobacco product or to enter a sweepstakes or drawing from a tobacco company? (tobacco_pricepromotions_everused_qrcode_sweepstakes)
In the past 30 days, did you use a coupon when buying cigarettes? ASK: Current users (tobacco_pricepromotions_30days_coupon_whenbuying_cigarettes)

validValue.meaningText: I did not buy cigarettes in the past 30 days (END QUESTIONNAIRE)
validValue.description: I did not buy cigarettes in the past 30 days (END QUESTIONNAIRE)

question.questionText: How many times in the past 30 days have you used a coupon to buy cigarettes? (tobacco_pricepromotions_howmanytimes_30days_usedcouponcigarettes_number)

protocol.longName: Self-reported Exposure to and Use of Price Promotions for Tobacco Products
protocol.preferredDefinition: This protocol includes 14 questions taken from a combination of the Wave 1 Adult and Youth Population Assessment of Tobacco and Health (PATH) Survey instruments. Collectively, the questions are used to measure consumer exposure to tobacco-product price promotions, including (but not limited to) lower price paid or free tobacco products, discounted prices when buying multiple tobacco product units, and free or discounted tobacco product with purchase of tobacco products.

form.longName: PhenX PX740501 - Selfreported Exposure To Tobacco Advertising At Point O
form.preferredDefinition: This protocol uses a combination of questions from the Wave 1 Adult and Wave 2 Youth Population Assessment of Tobacco and Health (PATH) Survey instruments. Collectively, the questions are used to measure consumer exposure to tobacco-product advertisements, which have been proven to increase the appeal of and demand for tobacco products.

module.longName: Self-reported Exposure to Tobacco Advertising at Point of Sale
module.preferredDefinition: Self-reported Exposure to Tobacco Advertising at Point of Sale

question.questionText: In the past 30 days, how often did you visit a convenience store, small market, or liquor store? ASK: All respondents. (tobaccoadvertising_pos_30days_storevisit_frequency)
In the past 30 days, when you visited convenience stores, small markets, or liquor stores, how often did you see ads for ecigarettes? (tobaccoadvertising_pos_30days_storevisit_seeecigarettes)
In the past 30 days, when you visited convenience stores, small markets, or liquor stores, how often did you see ads for tobacco products? (tobaccoadvertising_pos_30days_storevisit_seeadstobacco)

The next questions are about things you may have seen inside or outside shops or stores where people can buy tobacco products. In the past 30 days, have you seen cigarette or other tobacco packages being displayed, including on shelves or on the counter? ASK: All respondents (tobaccoadvertising_pos_30days_tobaccopackages_displayed)

Since you quit using tobacco, has there been a time when seeing a tobacco product display or other signs that tobacco is sold there, has given you an urge to buy tobacco? ASK: Former tobacco users who are not experimental current users of tobacco (tobaccoadvertising_pos_sincequitting_seeproducts_urgetobuy)

protocol.longName: Self-reported Exposure to Tobacco Advertising at Point of Sale
protocol.preferredDefinition: This protocol uses a combination of questions from the Wave 1 Adult and Wave 2 Youth Population Assessment of Tobacco and Health (PATH) Survey instruments. Collectively, the questions are used to measure consumer exposure to tobacco-product advertisements, which have been proven to increase the appeal of and demand for tobacco products.

form.longName: PhenX PX740601 - Selfreported Exposure To Tobacco Product Advertisements
form.preferredDefinition: This protocol uses a combination of questions from the 2011 International Tobacco Control (ITC) 4-Country Survey and the Population Assessment of Tobacco and Health (PATH) Study instruments. Collectively, the questions are used to assess tobacco product advertising and marketing exposure, in adult and youth populations, through traditional channels, such as magazines, television, and radio.

module.longName: Self-reported Exposure to Tobacco Product Advertisements
module.preferredDefinition: Self-reported Exposure to Tobacco Product Advertisements

question.questionText: Now I want to ask you about tobacco advertising. In the last 6 months, have you noticed cigarettes or tobacco products being advertised on posters or billboards? (tobaccoexposure_advertisements_posters_billboards)

Now I want to ask you about tobacco advertising. In the last 6 months, have you noticed cigarettes or tobacco products being advertised in newspapers or magazines? (tobaccoexposure_advertisements_newspapers_magazines)
Now I want to ask you about tobacco advertising. In the last 6 months, have you noticed cigarettes or tobacco products being advertised on radio? (tobaccoexposure_advertisements_radio)
The following questions ask about tobacco advertising that you may have seen. (info_740601)
What is the brand of your favorite tobacco advertisement? (tobaccoexposure_advertisements_brand_advertisement)

validValue.meaningText: I do not have a favorite advertisement
validValue.description: I do not have a favorite advertisement

question.questionText: DISPLAY 20 RANDOMLY SELECTED TOBACCO ADS HERE, ONE AT A TIME AND ASK THE QUESTIONS FOR EVERY AD (disp_ads_740601)
In the past 12 months, have you seen this advertisement before this study? (tobaccoexposure_advertisements_12months_seenthisad_1)

validValue.description: No (GO TO NEXT AD; IF LAST AD, END)

protocol.longName: Self-reported Exposure to Tobacco Product Advertisements
protocol.preferredDefinition: This protocol uses a combination of questions from the 2011 International Tobacco Control (ITC) 4-Country Survey and the Population Assessment of Tobacco and Health (PATH) Study instruments. Collectively, the questions are used to assess tobacco product advertising and marketing exposure, in adult and youth populations, through traditional channels, such as magazines, television, and radio.

form.longName: PhenX PX740701 - Selfreported Exposure To Tobacco Product Sponsorships
form.preferredDefinition: These questions from the International Tobacco Control (ITC) 4-Country Survey are directly related to exposure to tobacco product sponsorships.

module.longName: Self-reported Exposure to Tobacco Product Sponsorships
module.preferredDefinition: Self-reported Exposure to Tobacco Product Sponsorships

question.questionText: Thinking again about the last 6 months have you seen or heard about any sport or sporting event that is sponsored by or connected with BRANDS of cigarettes? (tobaccoexposure_6months_sporteventsponsored_cigarettebrands)

Thinking again about the last 6 months have you seen or heard about any Sport or sporting event that is sponsored by or connected with tobacco COMPANIES? (tobaccoexposure_6months_sporteventsponsored_cigarettecompanies)

Thinking again about the last 6 months have you seen or heard about any Music, theater, art, or fashion events that are sponsored by or connected with BRANDS of cigarettes? (tobaccoexposure_6months_otherevents_cigarettebrands)

protocol.longName: Self-reported Exposure to Tobacco Product Sponsorships
protocol.preferredDefinition: These questions from the International Tobacco Control (ITC) 4-Country Survey are directly related to exposure to tobacco product sponsorships.

form.longName: PhenX PX740801 - Selfreported Tobacco Product Price Paid Cigarettes
form.preferredDefinition: This protocol includes questions from the Wave 1 Adult Population Assessment of Tobacco and Health (PATH) Survey instrument. These specific questions are used to measure the price paid for cigarettes.

headerInstruction.text: ASK Current users and 12month former users . For current smokers, display "buy" and "do" For 12month former smokers, display "bought and "did."

module.longName: Self-reported Tobacco Product Price Paid - Cigarettes
module.preferredDefinition: Self-reported Tobacco Product Price Paid - Cigarettes

question.questionText: When you [buy/bought] cigarettes for yourself, [do/did] you usually buy manufactured cigarettes or a pouch of tobacco to rollyourown cigarettes? Choose all that apply.ASK: Current users and former users 12 month (tobaccoprice_cigarettes_usuallybuy_manufacturedrollown)
Do you usually buy cigarettes by the carton, pack or as single cigarettes? (tobaccoproductprice_cigarettes_usuallybuy_cartonpacksingle)
How many packs of cigarettes are in the carton you usually buy? (tobaccoproductprice_cigarettes_howmany_packscarton)
How many packs of cigarettes are in the carton you usually buy? (tobaccoproductprice_cigarettes_howmany_packscarton_encoded)
How much do you usually pay for a carton of cigarettes? (tobaccoproductprice_cigarettes_howmuch_carton)
How much do you usually pay for a carton of cigarettes? (tobaccoproductprice_cigarettes_howmuch_carton_encoded)
How much do you usually pay for a pack of cigarettes? (tobaccoproductprice_cigarettes_howmuch_pack)
How much do you usually pay for a pack of cigarettes? (tobaccoproductprice_cigarettes_howmuch_pack_encoded)
How much do you usually pay for a single cigarette? (tobaccoproductprice_cigarettes_howmuch_single)
How much do you usually pay for a single cigarette? (tobaccoproductprice_cigarettes_howmuch_single_encoded)

protocol.longName: Self-reported Tobacco Product Price Paid - Cigarettes
protocol.preferredDefinition: This protocol includes questions from the Wave 1 Adult Population Assessment of Tobacco and Health (PATH) Survey instrument. These specific questions are used to measure the price paid for cigarettes.

form.longName: PhenX PX740802 - Selfreported Tobacco Product Price Paid Cigars
form.preferredDefinition: This protocol includes questions from the Wave 1 Adult Population Assessment of Tobacco and Health (PATH) Survey instrument. These specific questions are used to measure the price paid for cigars.

headerInstruction.text: ASK Current users and bluntonly cigar smokers. If BLUNT_ONLY_GRILLO = 1, display "cigarillos for blunts" and "cigarillos" in question and option 2. If BLUNT_ONLY_GFC = 1, display "filtered cigars for blunts" and "filtered cigars" in question a..TRUNCATED

module.longName: Self-reported Tobacco Product Price Paid - Cigars
module.preferredDefinition: Self-reported Tobacco Product Price Paid - Cigars

question.questionText: 1.Do you usually buy [[CIGARFILL]s/cigarillos for blunts/filtered cigars for blunts] by the box or as single [[CIGARFILL]s/cigarillos/filtered cigars]? (tobaccoprice_cigar_usuallybuy_boxsingle)
2. How many [[CIGARFILL]s/cigarillos/filtered cigars] come in the box that you usually buy [for blunts]? (tobaccoprice_cigar_howmany_cigars_box)
2a.How many [[CIGARFILL]s/cigarillos/filtered cigars] come in the box that you usually buy [for blunts]? (tobaccoprice_cigar_howmany_cigars_boxencoded)
3.How much do you usually pay for a box of [[CIGARFILL]s/cigarillos for blunts/filtered cigars for blunts]? (tobaccoprice_cigar_how_much_box)
3a.How much do you usually pay for a box of [[CIGARFILL]s/cigarillos for blunts/filtered cigars for blunts]? (tobaccoprice_cigar_how_much_boxencoded)
4.How much do you usually pay for a single [[CIGARFILL]/cigarillo for a blunt/filtered cigar for a blunt]? (tobaccoprice_cigar_how_much_single)
4a. How much do you usually pay for a single [[CIGARFILL]/cigarillo for a blunt/filtered cigar for a blunt]? (tobaccoprice_cigar_how_much_singleencoded)

protocol.longName: Self-reported Tobacco Product Price Paid - Cigars
protocol.preferredDefinition: This protocol includes questions from the Wave 1 Adult Population Assessment of Tobacco and Health (PATH) Survey instrument. These specific questions are used to measure the price paid for cigars.

form.longName: PhenX PX740803 - Selfreported Tobacco Product Price Paid Ecigarettes
form.preferredDefinition: This protocol includes questions from the Wave 1 Adult Population Assessment of Tobacco and Health (PATH) Survey instrument. These specific questions are used to measure the price paid for e-cigarettes.

module.longName: Self-reported Tobacco Product Price Paid - E-Cigarettes
module.preferredDefinition: Self-reported Tobacco Product Price Paid - E-Cigarettes

question.questionText: Do you own an ecigarette? (tobaccoprice_ecigarette_own)
About how much did you pay for your ecigarette? Do not include the cost of additional cartridges or accessories unless they were included in a starter kit. (tobaccoprice_ecigarette_howmuchpaid)

protocol.longName: Self-reported Tobacco Product Price Paid - E-Cigarettes
protocol.preferredDefinition: This protocol includes questions from the Wave 1 Adult Population Assessment of Tobacco and Health (PATH) Survey instrument. These specific questions are used to measure the price paid for e-cigarettes.

form.longName: PhenX PX740804 - Selfreported Tobacco Product Price Paid Smokeless Tob
form.preferredDefinition: This protocol includes questions from the Wave 1 Adult Population Assessment of Tobacco and Health (PATH) Survey instrument. These specific questions are used to measure the price paid for smokeless tobacco such as snus pouches, loose snus, moist snuff, dip, spit, and chewing tobacco. Common brands include Redman, Levi Garrett, Beechnut, Skoal, Grizzly, Nordic Ice, and Copenhagen.

module.longName: Self-reported Tobacco Product Price Paid - Smokeless Tobacco
module.preferredDefinition: Self-reported Tobacco Product Price Paid - Smokeless Tobacco

question.questionText: How much do you usually pay for a container of [SMKLSSFILL] = smokeless tobacco snus? (tobaccoprice_smokeless_tobacco_howmuchpaid)
How much do you usually pay for a container of [SMKLSSFILL] = smokeless tobacco snus? (tobaccoprice_smokeless_tobacco_howmuchpaid_coded)
How many pouches are in the container of snus that you usually buy? (tobaccoprice_smokeless_tobacco_howmanypouch)
How many pouches are in the container of snus that you usually buy? (tobaccoprice_smokeless_tobacco_howmanypouch_coded)

protocol.longName: Self-reported Tobacco Product Price Paid - Smokeless Tobacco
protocol.preferredDefinition: This protocol includes questions from the Wave 1 Adult Population Assessment of Tobacco and Health (PATH) Survey instrument. These specific questions are used to measure the price paid for smokeless tobacco such as snus pouches, loose snus, moist snuff, dip, spit, and chewing tobacco. Common brands include Redman<sup></sup>, Levi Garrett<sup></sup>, Beechnut<sup></sup>, Skoal<sup></sup>, Grizzly, Nordic Ice<sup></sup>, and Copenhagen<sup></sup>.

form.longName: PhenX PX740901 - Selfreported Tobacco Product Purchase Location Cigare
form.preferredDefinition: This protocol includes questions from the Wave 1 Adult Population Assessment of Tobacco and Health (PATH) Survey instrument. These specific questions are used to measure the purchase location of cigarettes.

headerInstruction.text: ASK Current users and 12month former users.Display instruction for question and response option 4 fills: for current smokers, display "do." For 12month former smokers, display "did." For current smokers or 12month former smokers who smoke manu..TRUNCATED

module.longName: Self-reported Tobacco Product Purchase Location - Cigarettes
module.preferredDefinition: Self-reported Tobacco Product Purchase Location - Cigarettes

question.questionText: How [do/did] you usually buy [cigarettes/a pouch of rollyourown cigarette tobacco] for yourself? Is it... (selfreported_methodof_purchase_cigarettes)

validValue.meaningText: I [do/did] not buy my own [cigarettes/cigarette tobacco]
validValue.description: I [do/did] not buy my own [cigarettes/cigarette tobacco]

question.questionText: [Do/Did] you usually buy [cigarettes/rollyourown cigarette tobacco]...? (selfreported_locationof_purchase_cigarettes)
Where [do/did] you buy your [cigarettes/rollyourown cigarette tobacco] most of the time? (selfreported_locationof_vendor_cigarettes)

validValue.meaningText: A convenience store or gas station
validValue.description: A convenience store or gas station

validValue.meaningText: A supermarket, grocery store, or drug store
validValue.description: A supermarket, grocery store, or drug store

validValue.meaningText: A warehouse club, such as Sam's or Costco
validValue.description: A warehouse club, such as Sam's or Costco

validValue.meaningText: A smoke shop, tobacco specialty store, or tobacco outlet store
validValue.description: A smoke shop, tobacco specialty store, or tobacco outlet store

validValue.meaningText: A duty-free shop or military commisionary
validValue.description: A duty-free shop or military commisionary

validValue.meaningText: A bar, pub, restaurant, or casino
validValue.description: A bar, pub, restaurant, or casino

validValue.meaningText: A swap meet or flea market
validValue.description: A swap meet or flea market

validValue.meaningText: A store on an Indian reservation
validValue.description: A store on an Indian reservation

question.questionText: Where [do/did] you buy your [cigarettes/rollyourown cigarette tobacco] most of the time? (selfreported_locationof_vendor_cigarettes_othervendor)
